Summary: 3 disk shaped objects hover ,.then fly out of our atmospher
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around May 6th 2007
divs: Sighting Detailsi just came home from the movies,i was walking out of the van that droped me off...walked up my porch steps and sat down 2 smoke a cig_square when i looked up in the sky and noticed a bright object moving hovering..4 a moment then movine straight up and back down...i noticed 2 other object that were aluminated in the sky as well..but didnt suspect anything,the the first object i saw sudennly stopped moving.when i noticed 1 of the other ships were moving at an incredible speed in all sorts of directions.......i even put my arm in the air sticking my thum out 2 cover it,and c if it is realy moving....so i called my girl-f... and told her 2 look out side.then i was told 2 do somthing by my elder..my girlfriend seen the ships getting away,....... plz contact 4 more info!1.... joezam_zamjoe@yahoo.com ITS TRUE.ALEINS R OUT THERE ..........BELEIVE!
